biospec_descr.textblock: Plasma and serum samples are retained.

brief_summary.textblock:
The overall purpose is to explore the link between the gut and the bones by investigating
      meal stimulated changes in the blood level of a number of hormones and markers related to
      intestinal growth and bone turnover in patients undergoing surgery for obesity (gastric
      bypass). The hormones will be measured in blood samples taken before and after surgery. The
      results are compared with changes in body weight and body composition as measured by DEXA
      scanning.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Gastric Bypass Surgery on Gut Hormones Related to Bone Remodeling and Intestinal Growth.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Caucasians fulfilling the criteria for laparoscopic gastric bypass.

          -  BMI>40kg/m2.

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Pregnancy

          -  Chronic obstructive pulmonary disease

          -  Diabetes mellitus

          -  Chronic inflammatory bowel disease

          -  Major psychiatric disorder

          -  Drug abuse

study_pop.textblock:
Subjects are recruited from The Bariatric Clinic, The Hospital of Roskilde-Koege, The
        University of Copenhagen.

intervention.description: Body composition is determined by whole body deca scan and bone mineral density is determined dy dexa scans of the lumbar spine and the proximal femur.

facility.name: Hospital of Roskilde-Koege, The University of Copenhagen

clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Gastric Bypass Surgery on Gut Hormones Related to Bone Remodeling and Intestinal Growth.

oversight_info.authority: Denmark: Danish Health and Medicines Authority

primary_outcome.measure: Meal stimulated changes in gut hormones and bone markers.
primary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery and 4 weeks and 6 months after surgery.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.measure: Changes in bone mass and body composition.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Before surgery and 6 months after surgery.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Case-Only, Time Perspective: Prospective
